name: AFTER DEATH (itch) (Nicole Polidore, sharonohmg, JustinaY)
description:
After Death is a first-person walking simulator video game inspired by the games Dear Esther and Firewatch. You play as the Grim Reaper who has been commanded by Satan to reap a soul. But first, you must revisit the soul's last few moments of life to figure out what has caused the last soul's death. Will you reap it or grant it rebirth?

Team:

  • Game Design: Justina Yeung, Nicole Polidore & Sharon Oh
  • Head of Story & Audio: Nicole Polidore
  • Programming & 3D Modeler: Justina Yeung
  • Environmental Layout: Sharon Oh
